name: rclone
desc: Command line program to sync files and directories to and from major cloud storage

options.name: backup/restic.nix
options.desc: Path to the file containing rclone configuration. This file mustcontain configuration for the remote specified in this backup set andalso must be readable by root. Options set in rcloneConfigwill override those set in this file.

options.name: backup/restic.nix
options.desc: Configuration for the rclone remote being used for backup. See theremote’s specific options under rclone’s docs at https://rclone.org/docs/. Whenspecifying option names, use the “config” name specified in the docs.For example, to set --b2-hard-delete for a B2 remote, usehard_delete = true in the attribute set. Warning: Secretsset in here will be world-readable in the Nix store! Consider using thercloneConfigFile option instead to specify secret valuesseparately. Note that options set here will override those set in theconfig file.
options.type: null or (attribute set of (string or boolean))

options.name: monitoring/prometheus/exporters.nix
options.desc: Path to the file containing rclone configuration. This file mustcontain configuration for the remote specified in this backup set andalso must be readable by root.Options set in rcloneConfig will override those set inthis file.

options.name: monitoring/prometheus/exporters.nix
options.desc: Configuration for the rclone remote being used for backup. See theremote’s specific options under rclone’s docs at https://rclone.org/docs/. Whenspecifying option names, use the “config” name specified in the docs.For example, to set --b2-hard-delete for a B2 remote, usehard_delete = true in the attribute set.Secrets set in here will be world-readable in the Nix store! Considerusing the rcloneConfigFile option instead to specify secretvalues separately. Note that options set here will override those set inthe config file.

options.name: backup/restic.nix
options.desc: Options to pass to rclone to control its behavior. See https://rclone.org/docs/#optionsfor available options. When specifying option names, strip the leading--. To set a flag such as --drive-use-trash,which does not take a value, set the value to the Booleantrue.
options.type: null or (attribute set of (string or boolean))

options.name: monitoring/prometheus/exporters.nix
options.desc: Options to pass to rclone to control its behavior. See https://rclone.org/docs/#optionsfor available options. When specifying option names, strip the leading--. To set a flag such as --drive-use-trash,which does not take a value, set the value to the Booleantrue.
